
= Method:countRows = 

_ row counter _

This function will exclude the headers

sample of a csv file "my_cool.csv"



{{{
name,age,skill
john,13,knows magic
tanaka,8,makes sushi
jose,5,dances salsa
}}}


php implementation



{{{
$csv = new File_CSV_Get;
$csv->uses('my_cool.csv');
var_export($csv->countRows()); // returns 3
}}}


  * *Visibility*  public
  * *Returns* integer
